response.original_title: Shawn Michaels: Hits from the Heartbreak Kid
response.overview: Shawn Michaels isn't at a loss for words as he hosts this compilation of his greatest hits; from a rarely seen bout with Bret Hart, to battles with Razor Ramon and Mr. Perfect, it's an insightful look at the Heartbreak Kid.
response.tagline: Shawn Michaels isn't at a loss for words as he hosts this compilation of his greatest hits; from a rarely seen bout with Bret Hart, to battles with Razor Ramon and Mr. Perfect, it's an insightful look at the Heartbreak Kid.
response.title: Shawn Michaels: Hits from the Heartbreak Kid
